text: Cutthroat Island is a 1995 American romantic comedy movie directed by Renny Harlin. The movie is about pirates invading ships in 1668 Jamaica. Geena Davis plays Morgan Adams. This movie performed so poorly at the box office that, before Christmas 2010, it became a massive "box office bomb" and was considered the least successful movie in United States history. Its reviews from movie critics were very negative. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Pirate movies Category:Movies set in Jamaica Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies directed by Renny Harlin
title: Cutthroat Island
